<object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/KmMatNKvEpI&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/KmMatNKvEpI&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>

Made this lift some days ago. Just a simple oneway lift which can contain a portal, weapon, etc..
it moves in stages with a "tsssssh" sound on each stage:p lol 
both bsp, vmf, video and screenies in zip file=)

please credit me if you use it^^

bsp goes in : C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\*****\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

vmf goes in : C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\*****\sourcesdk_content\cstrike\mapsrc

***** = your steam name
